name: Game A Week Challenge Week 1
description:
W, A, S, Dでキャラ移動

ポイント、クリックで水滴発射

これは自分が作った最初のゲームです。ブロッコリに水をあげて助ける、っていうゲームを作ろうとしました。

W, A, S, D to move the Character.

Point and click with mouse to shoot water.

This is my first ever game and also the first game for my game a week challenge.

This is a shooting game, but the Idea is that you save the broccoli character by watering them.

This was made in Game Maker 2.

Please give me any kind of feedback if you played the game. Thank you. 

My sound track for this game is on SoundCloud.

SoundCloud
